thread.title: Bachelorette Sam Frost

author: dailytelegraph.com
title: Bachelorette Sam Frost
text:
THE Bachelorette’s Sam Frost said she is devastated after having spent four months trying to keep the identity of her chosen man a secret, only to have it ruined just a few hours before the big reveal.
Frost said she turned emotional on Thursday night after discovering paparazzi photos had been published by Daily Mail Australia just hours ahead of the season finale: “I was so upset, I could not stop crying. We worked so hard for such a long time. We were devastated.”
Sam Frost and Sasha Mielczarek had their fairytale spoiled. Picture: Instagram Sasha Mielczarek agreed, adding: “It was just devastating. Sam was really emotional. She was actually hysterical.”
Network Ten acted swiftly by serving an injunction on the Daily Mail, forcing them to take the story offline.
However, the website is challenging the term of the injunction, saying: “We do not consider that such a decision is either fair or right.”
